original_text: So now the Lord says, “You have refused to listen to my messages. You have continued to do things that make me angry. So you have brought trouble on yourselves.”
korean_text: 너희가 내 말을 순종하지 아니하고 너희 손으로 만든 것으로써 나의 노여움을 일으켜 스스로 해하였느니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: You have refused to listen to my messages
You have continued to do things
So you have brought trouble on yourselves
